articles.author: Amanda Jackson and Caroll Alvarado, CNN
articles.title: Michigan medical students walk out of induction ceremony to protest keynote speaker with anti-abortion views
articles.description: Dozens of incoming University of Michigan medical students walked out of their medical school induction ceremony Sunday to protest a keynote speaker with anti-abortion views.

articles.title: Marc Short hits back at Matt Gaetz over Pence remarks - CNN Video
articles.description: Marc Short, former chief of staff to former Vice President Mike Pence, fires back at Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) over critical comments he made about Pence during a recent speech.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Trump returns to a city poisoned by his legacy with an eye on 2024
articles.description: Before he left Washington in disgrace on January 20, 2021, Donald Trump vowed: "We will be back in some form." On this, at least, he was truthful.
articles.content:
(CNN)Before he left Washington in disgrace on January 20, 2021, Donald Trump vowed: "We will be back in some form." On this, at least, he was truthful. 
The 45th President never really went away as … [+8223 chars]

articles.title: 'Harbingers of doom': Anchor lashes out at meteorologist over heat wave reporting - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Jim Acosta reports on a tense interaction between a British meteorologist and anchor over the deadly UK heat wave, which Acosta likens to a scene from Netflix's "Don't Look Up."

articles.author: Dakin Andone and Elizabeth Wolfe, CNN
articles.title: California's Oak Fire has expanded rapidly as it scorches more than 16,000 acres near Yosemite National Park
articles.description: A ferocious wildfire outside California's Yosemite Park is "moving extremely fast" and limiting the amount of time authorities have to warn area residents to evacuate, a state fire official said.
articles.content: For more on the fires, "United Shades of America with W. Kamau Bell" heads to California to discover how communities are learning to coexist with the frequent destruction. The Original Series airs Su… [+5587 chars]

articles.title: Analysis: Searching for more oil as the world heats up
articles.description: Joe Biden's short-term political fortunes rely on gas prices getting lower, but the long-term fortunes of the country and the planet rely on people using less carbon-emitting energy. Rather than cut down on oil production, the world seems to be going in the o…

articles.title: It's hot as hell, and this meteorologist isn't taking it anymore
articles.description: You aren't alone; it's sizzling. Find out who's hot and who's not this week.

articles.author: Vanessa Yurkevich, CNN Business
articles.title: No water, burnt grass: Farmers forced to sell their cows as drought conditions worsen across the US
articles.description: Extreme drought and inflationary pressures are forcing US farmers in Western states to sell off their cattle herds in greater numbers, at levels not seen in over a decade.

articles.author: Opinion by Paul Hockenos
articles.title: Opinion:  A very European answer to air conditioning
articles.description: This year's sweltering temperatures have seen air conditioning purchases skyrocket across Europe. The catch is that air conditioning is an extremely energy-intensive means of cooling space. Could the answer lie in an AC unit that runs on renewable energy?
